IfYesDialog.text: This job will import the USER form. Ok to proceed?

ForEachRow.SQLExec: insert into wpkform (CanEdit, Caption, Colour, DefaultDetailView, DefaultLayout, FormClass, FormHeight, FormLeft, FormSwitches, FormTop, FormType, FormWidth, MasterView, Name, Notes, TestSwitches, UpdateCallerFlag, VideoRecordType, WPKFormID) values (:CanEdit, :Caption, :Colour, :DefaultDetailView, :DefaultLayout, :FormClass, :FormHeight, :FormLeft, :FormSwitches, :FormTop, :FormType, :FormWidth, :MasterView, :Name, :Notes, :TestSwitches, :UpdateCallerFlag, :VideoRecordType, :WPKFormID)

Record.FromClause: Staff key left outer join BroadbeanUser
Record.Name: Broadbean

Record.FromClause: department left outer join deptmaintenance on department.departmentid=deptmaintenance.departmentid and staffid=:F_staffid
Record.Name: Department Maintenance
Staff

Record.FromClause: division left outer join divisionaccess on division.divisionid=divisionaccess.divisionid and staffid=:F_staffid
Record.Name: {G_divisionname} Access

Record.Explanation: Please tick any Temp Desks in which the candidate will be registered
Record.FromClause: tempdesk key left outer join StaffExtTempdeskAccess tdap on tempdesk.tempdeskid=tdap.tempdeskid and tdap.staffid=:F_staffid
Record.Name: External TempDesk Access

Record.FromClause: wpkrole left outer join wpkassignedrole on wpkrole.wpkroleid=wpkassignedrole.wpkroleid and wpkassignedrole.ownerid=:F_staffid
Record.Name: Layout Settings
Record.SaveScript: !sql update staff set changetracker=isnull(changetracker,0)+1, manager=isnull((select first 1 from wpkassignedrole where wpkroleid='MANAGER' and ownerid=:F_staffid),0) where staffid=:F_staffid !if {!?F_staffid=C_userid:1} !!proxybutton #pbloaddefaults

Record.Name: Staff

Record.FromClause: wpkrole left outer join wpkassignedrole on wpkrole.wpkroleid=wpkassignedrole.wpkroleid and wpkassignedrole.ownerid=:F_staffid
Record.Name: Roles
Record.SaveScript: !sql update staff set changetracker=isnull(changetracker,0)+1, manager=isnull((select first 1 from wpkassignedrole where wpkroleid='MANAGER' and ownerid=:F_staffid),0) where staffid=:F_staffid !if {!?F_staffid=C_userid:1} !!proxybutton #pbloaddefaults

Record.FromClause: wpkrole left outer join wpkassignedrole on wpkrole.wpkroleid=wpkassignedrole.wpkroleid and wpkassignedrole.ownerid=:Q_defstaffid
Record.Name: Roles

ForEachRow.SQLExec: insert into wpkview (BackColour, CanEdit, CanSelect, CaptionBackColour, CaptionFontColour, CaptionWidth, DoubleClickButtonID, DragSourceType, DropTargetType, Explanation, FontColour, FromClause, GridMultiSelect, Image, MultiSelectColumnTitle, Name, NeedsRebuildCheck, NeedsReloadCheck, Notes, OuterJoinIndicatorFields, PreOpenScript, SaveScript, UpdatePrimaryKey, UpdateTable, UpdateVideoRecordType, ValidationScript, ViewType, WhereClause, WPKFormID, WPKViewID) values (:BackColour, :CanEdit, :CanSelect, :CaptionBackColour, :CaptionFontColour, :CaptionWidth, :DoubleClickButtonID, :DragSourceType, :DropTargetType, :Explanation, :FontColour, :FromClause, :GridMultiSelect, :Image, :MultiSelectColumnTitle, :Name, :NeedsRebuildCheck, :NeedsReloadCheck, :Notes, :OuterJoinIndicatorFields, :PreOpenScript, :SaveScript, :UpdatePrimaryKey, :UpdateTable, :UpdateVideoRecordType, :ValidationScript, :ViewType, :WhereClause, :WPKFormID, :WPKViewID)

Record.ComboScript: !If sql exists (select * from BroadbeanJobBoardAllocation where staffid = :F_StaffID and BroadbeanJobBoardID = :Q_BROADBEANJOBBOARDID) !!Abort {G_staffname} already has rights to {Q_BROADBEANJOBBOARDID__COMBO}
Record.Name: Job Board Rights
Record.PickList: select BroadbeanJobBoard.Name, BroadbeanJobBoard.BroadbeanJobBoardID from BroadbeanJobBoard order by BroadbeanJobBoard.Name

Record.Descriptor:
!Help If you set an expiry date, the user will no longer to be able to post jobs to the relevant job board after that date, otherwise the rights remain available until revoked.
Once entered, dates cannot be changed. Instead, revoke rights to the job board and re-grant them with the new expiry date.
Granting rights to job boards that your agency does not have a subscription to via Broadbean will have no effect. Please contact your Broadbean account manager:
Tel 020 7987 6900 Web www.broadbean.co.uk Email sales@broadbean.co.uk
Record.Name: Help

Record.Descriptor:
!Help Enter the user name and password previously set up on Broadbean. If you are not sure what details to enter, please contact your Broadbean account manager:
Tel 020 7987 6900 Web www.broadbean.co.uk Email sales@broadbean.co.uk
Record.Name: Help
Must also have the 'Department Maintenance' Role

Record.Descriptor: !ask Delete this User? !sql delete from deptmaintenance where staffid=:F_staffid !sql delete from staff where staffid=:F_staffid !closewithoutsaving
Record.Name: Delete
Website Rights

Record.Descriptor: !if !Q_haspassword !!message The user must use 'File - Change Password' to assign a password !!abort !ask Reset password for this user? !save !sql update staff set password=null where staffid=:F_staffid !refresh
Record.Name: {!?Q_haspassword:Reset Password:No Password}
Missed popup reminders are sent to these users

Record.ComboScript: !If sql exists (select * from PopUpEscalation where OrigStaffID = :F_StaffID and TargetStaffID = :Q_TargetStaffID) !!Abort {G_staffname} already escalates popus to {Q_TargetStaffID__COMBO}
Record.Name: Target User

Record.Descriptor: (if tdap.staffid is null then 0 else 1 endif)
Record.Name: Allow Access to Desk

Record.Descriptor: (if wpkassignedrole.ownerid is null then 0 else 1 endif)
Record.Name: Activate

Record.Descriptor: (if wpkassignedrole.ownerid is null then 0 else 1 endif)
Record.Name: Assigned

Record.Descriptor: (if wpkassignedrole.ownerid is null then 0 else 1 endif)
Record.Name: Assigned

ForEachRow.SQLExec: insert into wpkviewitem (BackColour, ButtonGroup, CanEdit, CanView, CaptionBackColour, CaptionFontColour, CheckValues, ComboScript, ComplexDataUpdateCommand, DataLength, DataType, DefaultValue, Descriptor, DisplayFormat, DisplaySize, Expanded, FontColour, IDforVideoRecordType, Image, Indent, ItemType, Mask, Name, Notes, PickList, Required, Sortable, SortExpression, SortOrder, WPKFormID, WPKViewID, WPKViewItemID) values (:BackColour, :ButtonGroup, :CanEdit, :CanView, :CaptionBackColour, :CaptionFontColour, :CheckValues, :ComboScript, :ComplexDataUpdateCommand, :DataLength, :DataType, :DefaultValue, :Descriptor, :DisplayFormat, :DisplaySize, :Expanded, :FontColour, :IDforVideoRecordType, :Image, :Indent, :ItemType, :Mask, :Name, :Notes, :PickList, :Required, :Sortable, :SortExpression, :SortOrder, :WPKFormID, :WPKViewID, :WPKViewItemID)

Record.Name: New
Record.WizardFinishScript:
!save
!sql insert into divisionaccess (staffid,divisionid) select '{F_staffid}',divisionid from divisionaccess where staffid=:Q_defstaffid
!sql insert into deptmaintenance (staffid,departmentid) select '{F_staffid}',departmentid from deptmaintenance where staffid=:Q_defstaffid
!foreachrow !!if Q_assigned !!!sql insert into wpkassignedrole (wpkroleid,ownerid) values (:Q_wpkroleid,:F_staffid) !!!if {!?Q_wpkroleid=MANAGER:1} !!!!sql update staff set manager=1 where staffid=:F_staffid
!refresh

ForEachRow.SQLExec: insert into wpklayout (CanSelect, Image, MenuWidth, MiddleSplitPercent, Name, Notes, ShowMenuImages, SortOrder, TopLeftView, TopRightView, TopSplitPercent, Wizard, WizardFinishScript, WPKFormID, WPKLayoutID) values (:CanSelect, :Image, :MenuWidth, :MiddleSplitPercent, :Name, :Notes, :ShowMenuImages, :SortOrder, :TopLeftView, :TopRightView, :TopSplitPercent, :Wizard, :WizardFinishScript, :WPKFormID, :WPKLayoutID)
insert into wpklayoutview (SortOrder, WPKFormID, WPKLayoutID, WPKViewID) values (:SortOrder, :WPKFormID, :WPKLayoutID, :WPKViewID)
